public class NumberFinder

Method Detail

findPatternPos

public int[] findPatternPos(NormalizedString input,
                            int fromPos,
                            int toPos,
                            int acceptPartial)
Find a number between the fromPos (inclusive normalized position) and the toPos (exclusive normalized position).

Returns:
an array with the normalized index of the first substring to match (at index 0), and its normalized length (at index 1) or null.
